page.title: 07HOME LIFE LONG PRESTON
page.content: When I wake up I read in bed until my mum calls me at eight o'clock.I put a skirt or dress on.I hardly ever wear jeans.For breakfast I have toast with syrup on.Then I go on the computer or mess about. At halfpast eight I set off wearing a full length coat and black shoes.My mum takes my bike down the road so that I can bike up again after school. We wait for a bus.It takes five minutes to Long Preston.School starts at nine o'clock.I play about until the teachers come in. We read before we get our work out.We usually do Maths before break and English after break.We have break at twenty to eleven.Twelve o'clock is dinner time then we go outside and play until one o'clock.In the afternoon we do some activities.
